1: <pb/>A yet max watx'ji el muralla tu xin, c'al watx'ji oc is puertail, max waon oc eb taynem puertail templo, eb chi bitni c'al yetok juntzanxa eb levita.
2: Max waoc cawan eb ti' yin ikbajwomal yin conob Jerusalén, a ton wuẍtak Hanani c'al Hananías tol comandante yayji bay cuartel yet Jerusalén. Asannej oc jun tu' caw wal tol miman yelapnok yul sat anima, caw wal miman c'apax yelapnok Dios yul sat.
3: Max waloni tol ato yet canxa c'u, catatu' chi jakay puertail Jerusalén, axa yet yayc'ualil caw wal watx' chi yun makayi, yet c'amto chi el eb taynem puerta tu'. Max waon c'apax oc jaywan eb cajyom bay Jerusalén yin tayneni, ay mac txequelnej bay chi taynej, ay pax mac xin, chi taynej bay cawilal is yatut.
4: A jun conob ti' caw wal miman yayji ocok, palta txennej anima cajanxa ec'ok, yujtol c'amtoc'al chi ca watx'nelay aj nalak.
5: <pb/>Axca tu xin, a Dios max ak'on wunej max in wajban oc masanil eb winak tol mimek yelapnok, eb yajaw yayji xol conob tu', yetok eb c'am ikbej ayoc yiban, yet chi tz'ibelay eb yul libro atac'ala' yichmam eb, cax max ilchaj c'apaxtek tx'an un bay tz'ibbilcan yichmam eb tol ayxatax meltzojtek, a ton bay tu' tz'ibbil axca ti':
6: <pb/>A ton is listail eb yinatil eb titnak bay Judá ti': a ton eb max ilaytok yuj Nabucodonosor, reyal Babilonia. Max lajwi tiempoal ayic' eb yin presoal bay tu', max meltzojtek eb bay Jerusalén c'al bay juntzanxa lugar yul yet Judá, junjunc'al max apni oc bay is conobal. Ikbabil eb yuj eb cham ti': a ton Zorobabel, Josué, Nehemías, Azarías, Raamías, Nahamani, Mardoqueo, Bilsán, Misperet, Bigvai, Nehum c'al Baana.
11: <t>Eb yet Pahat-moab, a eb tu' yinatil Josué eb, c'al yinatil Joab, 2,818 eb.</t>
21: <t>Eb yet Ater, a ton eb yinatil Ezequías, 98 eb.</t>
26: <t>Eb aj Belén c'al eb aj Netofa, 188 eb.</t>
29: <t>Eb aj Quiriat-jearim, Cafira c'al Beerot, 743 eb.</t>
30: <t>Eb aj Ramá c'al eb aj Geba, 621 eb.</t>
32: <t>Eb aj Betel c'al eb aj Hai, 123 eb.</t>
33: <t>Eb aj yet is cab Nebo, 52 eb.</t>
34: <t>Eb aj yet is cab Elam, 1,254 eb.</t>
37: <t>Eb aj Lod, Hadid c'al Ono, 721 eb.</t>
39: <t>Axa jun makan eb sacerdote yinatil Jedaías, yinatil c'apax Josué, 973 eb.</t>
43: <pb/>Axa eb levita yinatil Josué c'al Cadmiel, a juntzan eb tu' yinatilto c'apax Hodavías, ay 74 eb.
44: <pb/>Axa eb yinatil Asaf, eb chi bitni, ay 148 eb.
45: <pb/>Axa eb taynem puerta, yinatil Salum eb, eb yet Ater, eb yet Talmón, eb yet Acub, eb yet Hatita c'al eb yet Sobai, ay 138 eb yin masanil.
46: <pb/>Axa eb max ak'wi serbil bay templo, a ton eb yinatil Ziha, eb yet Hasufa, eb yet Tabaot,
47: eb yet Queros, eb yet Siaha, eb yet Padón,
48: eb yet Lebana, eb yet Hagaba, eb yet Salmai,
49: eb yet Hanán, eb yet Gidel, eb yet Gahar.
50: Eb yet Reaía, eb yet Rezín, eb yet Necoda,
51: eb yet Gazam, eb yet Uza, eb yet Paseah,
52: eb yet Besai, eb Neunim, eb Nefusim,
53: eb yet Bacbuc, eb yet Hacufa, eb yet Harhur,
54: eb yet Bazlut, eb yet Mehida, eb yet Harsa,
55: eb yet Barcos, eb yet Sísara, eb yet Tema,
56: eb yet Nezía c'al yetok eb yet Hatifa.
57: <pb/>Axa eb yak'omal serbil Salomón, a ton eb yinatil Sotai, eb yet Soferet, eb yet Peruda,
58: eb yet Jahala, eb yet Darcón, eb yet Gidel,
59: eb yet Sefatías, eb yet Hatil, eb yet Poqueret-hazebaim c'al eb yet Amón.
60: A masanil eb max ak'wi serbil bay templo c'al eb yinatil eb yak'omal serbil Salomón ay 392 eb yin masanil.
61: <pb/>A eb max tit bay Tel-mela, bay Tel-harsa, bay Querub, bay Adón, c'al bay Imer, maj je' tx'oxon el ba eb tatol Israel eb yuj yinatil, a ton eb ti':
62: Eb yinatil Delaía, eb yet Tobías, c'al yetok eb yet Necoda. A eb tu' ay 642 eb.
63: Eb yican ba yetok eb sacerdote, a ton eb ti': Eb yinatil Habaía, eb yet Cos, c'al eb yet Barzilai, a ton jun tu' max nupay yetok cutz'in Barzilai aj Galaad, xan a bi is ni' tu' max yikcan ajok.
64: A eb tu' max say yil eb is bi tu' bay yul libroal bay tz'ibbilcan bi eb ichmamej, palta maj ilchaj yuj eb bay tu', caytu' max yun yilay el eb yin sacerdoteal.
65: Max yalon cham gobernador tol c'am chi je' loon eb ixim pan tol yet Dios yayji ocok, masantac'al ok yal yilon junok sacerdote yin Urim c'al yin Tumim tatol yel yinatil Aarón eb.
67: C'amoc eb nak chekbej c'al eb ix chekbej tz'akilok. A eb tu' ay 7,337 eb yin masanil. Ay c'apax 245 eb winak c'al eb ix chi bitni.
68: Ay c'apax 736 no caballo, 245 no mula,
69: ay 435 no camello c'al yetok 6,720 no burro.
70: <pb/>Ay juntzan eb yajaw yayji xol yican max yak' eb sabalej yuj watx'jubal templo. Max yak' cham gobernador bay tesorería 16 libra ch'en oro, yetok 50 mimek sec' c'al yetok 530 an pichilej yet eb sacerdote.
71: C'al juntzanxa eb yajaw yayji xol yican max yak' eb bay tesorería 337 libra ch'en oro c'al yetok 3,215 libra ch'en plata.
72: Axa janic'okxa eb conob max yak' eb 337 libra ch'en oro, 24 quintal ch'en plata, c'al yetok 67 an pichilej yet eb sacerdote.
73: <pb/>A eb sacerdote yetok eb levita, eb taynem puerta, eb chi bitni, c'al yetok masanil eb anima ay bay conob tu', eb chi ak'wi serbil bay templo, c'al yetok masanil eb israel max watx'nej ay cajan ba eb bay yulak is conobal, ẍi yul tx'an tu'.
